epics.title: Loan Application Portal
epics.description: Customer-facing portal for submitting loan applications digitally, tracking status and receiving notifications.

userStories.title: As a customer I can fill out and submit a loan application online
userStories.description: Enables customers to submit personal/home loan applications and upload required documents.

tasks.title: Render loan application form
tasks.description: Display fields for personal info, loan type, amount, and document upload.
acceptanceCriteria: Form fields are shown and can be completed.

tasks.title: Implement document upload
tasks.description: Allow customer to upload ID and income documents, preview uploaded files.

tasks.title: Show application confirmation and status tracking
tasks.description: Display confirmation and status after submission.

userStories.title: As a customer I get notified of updates via email/SMS
userStories.description: On application status change, customer gets mock notifications.

tasks.title: Trigger and render mock notification
tasks.description: Show notification panel with email/SMS simulation.
acceptanceCriteria: Notifications can be 'sent' and displayed visibly.

epics.title: Loan Management Dashboard
epics.description: Internal dashboard for loan officers and underwriters to manage, approve, and track loan applications.

userStories.title: As a loan officer I can review and approve loan applications
userStories.description: Internal users see applications, review uploaded docs, and issue approvals/rejections.

tasks.title: Render application list and details
tasks.description: Show table of applications with status, allow viewing details.

tasks.title: Implement approve/reject actions
tasks.description: Actions change application status and show success/error messages.

userStories.title: As an underwriter I can see credit scores and document verification
userStories.description: Shows credit report, OCR result, and compliance for each application.

tasks.title: Mock integration with Credit Bureau API
tasks.description: Simulate API call and display credit data per application.
acceptanceCriteria: Async call shows loading, then credit score.

tasks.title: Mock integration with Document OCR API
tasks.description: Simulate OCR result for uploaded docs.

epics.title: Notification & Reporting System
epics.description: Automated notifications for loan events and reporting backend for analytics.

userStories.title: As an admin I can view summary reports on loan application metrics
userStories.description: Analytics dashboard shows KPIs â€” processed percentage, manual intervention, CSAT, uptime.

tasks.title: Render analytics dashboard
tasks.description: Charts/tables show summary data per PRD objectives.
acceptanceCriteria: KPIs shown: % auto-processed, % manual intervention, uptime, CSAT.

userStories.title: As a user I receive reminders and compliance notifications
userStories.description: Receive regular reminders and compliance updates via mock UI.

tasks.title: Implement mock notification interface
tasks.description: Allow admin to send system notifications; users see popups.
acceptanceCriteria: Notifications can be sent and appear for user.
